attributes.action: A lison Wilkes--change the no smoking ban
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear sir
straight to the point,i am a non smoker
but have been in the pub trade for a number of years,have you seen how many pubs are closing?have you seen how many jobs have gone?because of yoUR no smoking.,give licencees the choice of being a smoking or a non smoking pub.
my god do you want this whole country to go under ,as certainly in my area alot has,
i dont believe how many pubs have closed since this law came in.
myself ,and alot of others have decided to quit britain,and take our money elsewhere.
my house is up for sale,and when i sell it,i will be joining 4 of my fellow brits in taking up residence in spain.
as my £100.000 will be well spent elsewhere but taken out of this
great british country.
this is now considered a GRANNY STATE.
big brother is watching.please give us back our own individual rights,if people want to smoke let them.
have you seen the ciggarette ends lying all over the place since the ban.
i bet that causes more pollution&work
people are moving abroad to get away from the GRANNY STATE,
PLEASE GIVE THE NO SMOKING BAN ANOTHER THOUGHT,OR THERE WILL BE NO ONE HERE APART FROM ILLEGALS,TO EVEN LISTEN TO IT.
Regards   Alison Wilkes
soon to be EX PAT

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
